997150.name: Koliseum Soccer VR - Deluxe Edition
997150.description:
Koliseum Soccer VR is the most epic game of table soccer in VR. Also called Babyfoot, Foosball or Kicker, it is one of the most iconical arcade game ever. We recreated the gameplay that everyone knows but with a twist.

What is included in Deluxe version


  • 19 customized heads and hats
  • 19 customized bar handles
  • 19 customized goal effects
  • 3 Early-accesss only Founders Pack
997150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
